column2: With new technological advances, the giant iron reserves in Kiruna are finally ready for full exploitation.
Thanks to new explosive Nitroglycerin, we can expand our mining operations even further.

Our mining operations are now in full swing and the reserves will not be depleted for centuries. By improving living conditions in the arctic climate for our miners, we can increase our yield for generations to come!
With new rail technology, we can expand our operation even further!
Our miners have hit a new rich deposit of iron ore in our Kiruna Iron Mine. We have not yet explored it fully, but are certain of a huge increase of iron production.
